Description:
chronic is a comedy about small-time desperados who share a burning
need. In the Canadian tradition of Goin&#039; Down The Road and Hard Core
Logo, chronic is a classic film about sex, drugs, and hosers.

Rival pot dealers Ernie (Kurt Pabst) and Jerome (Tim Walker) stake
their claims while working out of a pizza shop. Jerome&#039;s wife Susan
(Lea Lawrynowicz) thinks her husband is a hopeless case and she sets
in motion her plan to take over his business. On the other hand, it is
two weeks before the harvest, and nobody can score.
